title: Mana Regeneration
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||Doubles your natural MP regeneration rate.||You regenerate magic rapidly.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
[[Deep Elves]] begin with this mutation. Also used for the [[demonspawn mutation]], [[Mana Shield]].
|- 
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Good_mutations|Good mutation]]
|}
